Description: 2 fragments of papyrus joined together (for book binding?) with remains of Coptic text on one side: 1 line in a fine uncial hand, with traces of 2 lines in different hand on other fragment. EA 75376, 75377, 75378, 75379, 75380, 75381, 75382, 75383, 75384, 75385, 75386, 75387, 75388 are mounted together.
Curator's comments: Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
